attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
unfair treatment in thailand
dear sir has british subjects living in thailand we cannot own property or land cars motorcycles yet thai,s that come to the uk can do everything own property etc etc why cant we have the same privilage here thank you sir 

         john gallear

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
